result.name: controlled-parking-zones4
result.notes: Identification of roads within a Controlled Parking Zone.
result.title: Controlled Parking Zones

extras.value: The extent of the Controlled Parking Zone on the public highway should be determined on site as per the reulatory traffic signs and road markings
